Commands.Pray: Grants Rosa's Prayer for 5 turns.  Raises all party members' BRV based on Attack.  Rosa's Prayer raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack.
Commands.Luminous Arrow: 4-HIT AoE BRV attack + single target HP attack.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 120% of Max BRV.  Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt.  Doesn't consume ability use on the next turn.

Passives.Divine Blast Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Divine Blast.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Rosa's Prayer Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while Rosa's Prayer is active.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Divine Blast Charge: Increases Divine Blast's max uses by 1.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Devoted White Mage: Slightly raises party's Initial BRV and Attack while Rosa's Prayer is active.
Passives.Rosa's Prayer Attack Up II: Moderately raises Attack while Rosa's Prayer is active.
Passives.Divine Blast Extend: Increases Divine Blast's number of hits to 3.Moderately raises its total potency.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Rosa's Prayer is active.BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT stronger ranged BRV attack.
Passives.Rosa's Prayer Boost&Speed Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while Rosa's Prayer is active.
Passives.Pray Extend: Increases Pray's max uses by 1.Moderately raises the BRV gain based on Attack.Slightly improves the effects of Rosa's Prayer.Lowers Action Delay.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ while Rosa's Prayer is active.HP Attack+ is a 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack.

Weapons.Elven Bow CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Luminous Arrow
Weapons.Power Bow CP: 15: Raises Divine Blast's potency.Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt.
Weapons.Great Bow CP: 35: Raises the BRV gain based on Attack.Improves the effects of Rosa's Prayer and extends its duration.Grants Reraise to all party members for 5 turns.Reraise instantly raises a KOed party member.
